name: Joseph PILCHESKY, Appellant v. Edward RENDELL, Governor; State Senator Robert Mellow, Democratic Caucus Leader, Representative WM. Deweese, House Majority Leader; PA. parties: Joseph PILCHESKY, Appellant v. Edward RENDELL, Governor; State Senator Robert Mellow, Democratic Caucus Leader, Representative WM. Deweese, House Majority Leader; PA. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of April, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
946 A.2d 92
Joseph PILCHESKY, Appellant v. Edward RENDELL, Governor; State Senator Robert Mellow, Democratic Caucus Leader, Representative WM. Deweese, House Majority Leader; PA. April 30, 2008.
